named-query.name: BC_READ_DISPUTES_BY_STATE_ID
named-query.query: SELECT dispute FROM com.enclothe.core.dispute.domain.Dispute dispute WHERE dispute.disputeState.id = :stateId

named-query.name: BC_READ_DISPUTE_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT dispute FROM com.enclothe.core.dispute.domain.Dispute dispute WHERE dispute.id = :id

named-query.name: BC_READ_DISPUTES_BY_CHANNEL_ID
named-query.query: SELECT dispute FROM com.enclothe.core.dispute.domain.Dispute dispute WHERE dispute.disputeChannel.id = :channelId

named-query.name: BC_READ_DISPUTES_BY_PRIORITY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT dispute FROM com.enclothe.core.dispute.domain.Dispute dispute WHERE dispute.disputePriority.id = :priorityId
